Class NBodyBenchmark

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.benchmark.NBodyBenchmark
All Implemented Interfaces:
RunnableBenchmark
public class NBodyBenchmark extends Object implements RunnableBenchmark
N-body gravitational simulation using JScience API.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
